wallet.installWallet: Install MetaMask, Phantom or another compatible wallet

hero.title: Decentralized Staking Platform
hero.subtitle: Deposit USDT, earn daily yields, and get rewarded for referrals. Built on BNB Smart Chain for educational purposes.

secureDeposits.title: Secure Deposits
secureDeposits.description: All transactions are on-chain and transparent on BNB Smart Chain

dailyYields.title: Daily Yield Staking
dailyYields.description: Stake 100 USDT and earn 1% daily compound interest

dashboard.shareLink: Share this link to earn commissions: 10% (L1), 5% (L2), 3% (L3), 2% (L4), 1% (L5)
dashboard.connectWallet: Connect your wallet to see the dashboard
dashboard.noDeposits: Your wallet is connected but you haven't made any deposits yet.

gettingStarted.title: To get started:
gettingStarted.step2: 2. Funds will go to your available balance
gettingStarted.step3: 3. With 100+ USDT you can create an investment

withdrawal.warning: Withdrawal includes ONLY your personal funds (available + locked profits + unlocked investments). Referral balance can be withdrawn separately. A 20% tax is applied to the total amount. All personal balances will be reset after withdrawal.
withdrawal.referralWarning: Referral withdrawal withdraws ONLY the referral commission balance. Your personal funds (available, locked profits, investments) remain intact.
